content: sylvie scarf pattern by missbriannajane stitches ● linen stitch single_crochet + ch1 into a ch1 space ● modified i-cord edging materials ● 4mm crochet hook x2 ○ for the modified i-cord border you will need 2 crochet hooks of the same or smaller size without any grips on it if you don t plan on doing the border only one hook is needed ● 50g of fingering weight yarn ○ body is ~40g ○ border is ~8g quick notes before starting ● increase repeat in increment row of 9 ● total width is 14 linen stitches wide ● total scarf length is 48in long and 4in thick at the widest ● uses about 220yrds or 48g of fingering weight yarn ● rather than increasing in the first chain space in an increase row we will be increasing after 1sc as that will yield straighter edges ● i-cord modified border is optional but really finishes off the neckerchief well ● took me ~7hrs for the scarf without the border and ~3hrs for the scarf with the border while watching tv body chain 3 row 1 1 single_crochet in
